About Me

Let me tell you a few things about myself...

BIO

My name is Amit Pawar, I live in Bangalore. My native place is Karwar which is in Uttar Kannada, Karnataka. As for my qualification I have done B.E in Computer Science and Engineering from KLS Gogte Institute of Technology in 2018, and I have done my PUC 2nd year from St.Joseph PU College. After my graduation I have done Web Development training from Udemy and Jspiders from Bangalore.
My Strengths are positive attitude, quick learning ability, punctuality and I am a good team player. My short term goal is to consistently add value to myself through learning and upgrading skills. In the long term, I would like to grow as a leader and make myself capable of taking a managerial position while contributing towards growth of my organization.
Coming to my family background, In my family there are 3 members including me, my father is a retired employee, my mother is government employee.
My hobbies are listening to music, traveling with friends and family, I love to watch and play cricket and I am also avid comic reader.
